changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, ba.id, ba.agency_location, a.name AS attribute, ba.key AS key, ba.numeric_value, ba.integer_value, ba.boolean_value, ba.text_value, u.name AS unit, ba.notes, up.name AS updated_by, ba.version FROM agency_location_attribute ba JOIN attribute a ON ba.attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN unit u ON ba.unit = u.id JOIN agency up ON ba.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON ba.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
